summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a dinner invitation involving notable individuals including the co-founder of Facebook and the founder of Spotify. The email emphasizes confidentiality and contains a disclaimer regarding attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, inviting Jes Staley to a dinner at his house.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, invited to the dinner hosted by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Parker
persons.context: Parker is mentioned as one of the notable individuals who will be attending the dinner at Epstein's house.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is inviting Jes Staley to a social dinner at his house.

events.title: Dinner Invitation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein invites Jes Staley to a dinner at his house, which will include notable guests.

keyFacts: The email discusses a dinner invitation for September 18, 2011.
Notable individuals mentioned include the co-founder of Facebook and the founder of Spotify.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
